column1: Monthly rent price quartiles, by country and region, England, 2012 to 2018 (£)
Source: Valuation Office Agency - Private rental market statistics
1. Monthly private rent prices are taken from the Private Rental Market Summary statistics (PRMS) which were produced by the Valuation Office Agency, but are now produced by ONS.
2. This data provides rent price quartiles (lower quartile, median and upper quartile), but the 100th percentile is not available.
3. The rent prices are a summary of monthly rents recorded between 1st April to 31st March each year.
4. Rent price quartiles are rounded to the nearest pound (£).
